price: Garuu rahmata Gooftaa kee irraa ta’eef (isa eegne), tolli Isaa si irratti guddaa ta’eera.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
